inclusion.criterion: suitable anatomy for transfemoral TAVI with the Portico Transcatheter Aortic Valve System
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: mechanical heart valve or other indication for oral anticoagulation (i.e. recent pulmonary embolism)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, but also has atrial fibrillation and a mechanical heart valve, which are contraindications for the trial.
